name: 蔡昕皓
objective:
What is technology to you? A trendy ipad? A swipe and go payment system? Or a cure-all prescription that saves life?
How has technology changed your life so far? Hassle-free travel arrangements? Trouble-free online banking? No more dictionaries, no more phonebooks, no more notebooks, and no longer lost in the middle of nowhere, because Google has it all?
Modern technology has seemingly presented us all the convenience, simplicity, efficiency and an ever possible brighter future. But, is that all it has brought to us? What’s more that it could offer and what’s the catch? Do remember, it’s just the beginning.
